function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"The mention of maldives and international travel, indicating potential movement across borders and exposure to different disease ecosystems.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Exposure to contagious diseases from indigenous communities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unsanitary conditions from local schools and communities","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about disease prevention and containment","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improper disposal of coronavirus-related medical waste","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reuse of face masks made from coffee","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Close consumer closeness in the age of social distancing","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential spread of contagious diseases through close contact during classes and interview sessions","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness and education about contagious diseases and preventive measures","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate healthcare facilities and response protocols for disease outbreaks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaborating with other businesses may lead to increased exposure to contagious diseases if proper precautions are not taken.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Customers gathering around food trucks may facilitate the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Customers sharing food-related experiences in person and online may contribute to the spread of contagious contagious diseases if proper hygiene and safety practices are not followed.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vicariously participating in everyday business and increasing perceived transparency may lead to complacency in following social distancing and health guidelines, risking the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Enabling customers to interact with each other while respecting social distancing guidelines may lead to challenges in maintaining strict adherence to the guidelines, increasing the risk of contagious disease transmission.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of social distancing in the food truck risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Reliance on social media for customer engagement","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential for contagious diseases to spread in risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Long lines of people waiting for food","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of hashtags to be part of a larger conversation about the community","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Collaboration among businesses may lead to increased physical interaction and potential spread of contagious
